# nxos_logging (Data Source)

This data source can read the logging configuration.

- API Documentation: [loggingLogLevel](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/System/logging:LogLevel/)

### Additional API Documentation

- [loggingFacility](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-3-1/docs/System/logging:Facility/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_logging" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `all` (String) All logging level.
- `facilities` (Attributes List) List of logging facilities. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--facilities))
- `id` (String) The distinguished name of the object.
- `level` (String) Severity level.

<a id="nestedatt--facilities"></a>
### Nested Schema for `facilities`

Read-Only:

- `level` (String) Logging severity level.
- `name` (String) Logging facility name.
